game_description: PLEASE READ BEFORE PLAYING ***This is an early version free demo for Quest users*** We are excited to receive anticipations that are through the roof at this point and we couldn’t let you guys wait any longer. We decided to release the standalone demo version of Grimlord, to let the community witness and supervise our development process. We are working relentlessly on porting the complete EA experience to Quest. Stay tuned and please don’t hold back on feedback and constructive criticisms, we appreciate every single one of them. ABOUT From the lowest of beginnings, fight your way out. Your fighting style is unrestricted, your crafting options are limitless, and your enemies are versatile and fierce. Your future and the future of this land lie in your hands. This is a story-driven, classic action RPG that is native to VR interactions. This is what’s been missing for long. This is Grimlord. KEY FEATURES * Creative Combat Styles - Hold your weapon wherever you want, however, you want, and use real-life fight styles to defeat your foe. * Immerse into a good-ole Souls-style map loop, where every short-cut and fire point gives a sense of safety * Weaponry Customization - Dozens of weapon parts to unlock and hundreds of combinations * Variety of Enemies & Epic Boss Fight
